titles.title: To direct the Secretary of State to provide assistance and technical expertise to enhance the representation and leadership of the United States at international standards-setting bodies that set standards for 5th and future generations mobile telecommunications systems and infrastructure, and for other purposes.
Promoting United States International Leadership in 5G Act of 2019
Promoting United States International Leadership in 5G Act of 2019
Promoting United States International Leadership in 5G Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
